questions.question: Production of lactic acid by fermentation is a classic example of:
Non-growth associated products like penicillin are produced:

answers.a: When specific rate of product formation is proportional to the specific rate of growth
answers.c: Just after the death phase when intracellular proteins are released into medium by the dead cells

questions.question: Which of the following time profile is fundamentally incorrect and shouldnâ€™t be observed during the course of experiment:

answers.b: Product concentration increases with decreasing slope

questions.question: During the formation of growth associated products, the rate of substrate consumption depends upon:

answers.d: Sum of cell maintenance, product formation and biomass production

answers.a: After fermentation has reached a stage, some culture is removed from vessel and replaced by fresh medium
answers.b: Volume decreases and specific growth rate increases
answers.c: The growth medium is added during the process and no culture is removed till the end
